AI Impact Assessment

The AI Impact Assessment helps in ensuring responsible AI by design, covering all phases of an AI project, including assessment, implementation, and use of the AI system.

Key Concepts:

  • Assessing AI systems for impact and responsibility
  • Ensuring transparency and accountability in AI decision-making
  • Managing data quality and privacy in AI applications
  • Artificial Intelligence Impact Assessment
  • Proportionality of AI deployment
  • Ethical considerations in AI development
AI Impact Assessment Responsible AI Data Governance Risk Management AI Assessment Data governance Risk management
